alert.note: Alert for Meade; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 8:14PM MDT until June 12 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Meade County in west central South Dakota... Northeastern Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 900 PM MDT. * At 814 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southeast of Elm Springs, or 41 miles east of Rapid City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Creighton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for west central South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
